Superstore_latest.xlsx"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.ExcelFileComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","dataSourceLogicalName":"","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"componentId":5,"componentName":"Category_totalsales","tableName":"Category_totalsales","category":"Processor","componentType":"SQL","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[4],"options":{"dbTable":"SELECT 
  Category, 
  ROUND(SUM(CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(Sales, '[^0-9.]', '') AS DOUBLE)), 2) AS Sum_of_Sales
FROM excel_file_4_superstore_orders
GROUP BY Category
ORDER BY Sum_of_Sales DESC"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.SQLComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"componentId":6,"componentName":"Region_sum_of_sales","tableName":"Region_sum_of_sales","category":"Processor","componentType":"SQL","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[4],"options":{"dbTable":"SELECT 
    Region, 
    ROUND(SUM(CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(Sales, '[^0-9.]', '') AS DOUBLE)), 2) AS Sum_of_Sales 
FROM 
    Excel_file_4_superstore_orders 
GROUP BY 
    Region"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.SQLComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"componentId":7,"componentName":"segment_sales_profit_discount","tableName":"segment_sales_profit_discount","category":"Processor","componentType":"SQL","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[4],"options":{"dbTable":"SELECT 
  Segment,
  ROUND(SUM(CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(Sales, '[^0-9.]', '') AS DOUBLE)), 2) AS Total_Sales,
  SUM(CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(Quantity, '[^0-9]', '') AS INT)) AS Total_Quantity,
  ROUND(SUM(CAST(Profit AS DOUBLE)), 2) AS Total_Profit,
  ROUND(SUM(CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(Discount, '[^0-9.]', '') AS DOUBLE)), 2) AS Total_Discount
FROM 
  excel_file_4_superstore_orders
GROUP BY 
  Segment"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.SQLComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"componentId":8,"componentName":"subcategory_sum_of_sales","tableName":"subcategory_sum_of_sales","category":"Processor","componentType":"SQL","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[4],"options":{"dbTable":"SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN Sub_Category = 'Art' THEN 'Art,Phones'
        WHEN Sub_Category = 'Phones' THEN 'Art,Phones,Phones'
        ELSE Sub_Category
    END AS Sub_Category,
    ROUND(SUM(CAST(REGEXP_REPLACE(Sales, '[^0-9.]', '') AS DOUBLE)), 2) AS Rounded_Sum_of_Sales
FROM excel_file_4_superstore_orders
GROUP BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN Sub_Category = 'Art' THEN 'Art,Phones'
        WHEN Sub_Category = 'Phones' THEN 'Art,Phones,Phones'
        ELSE Sub_Category
    END;"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.SQLComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","excludeNotification":"N"},{"parallelRuns":5,"onlyInA":"Y","onlyInB":"Y","difference":"Y","enableTrim":"N","replaceNull":"N","autoDataTypeConversion":"Y","columnDifferencesCount":"N","ignoreCase":"N","hasDuplicates":"N","onlyInAThresholdUnit":"number","onlyInAThreshold":0.0,"onlyInBThresholdUnit":"number","onlyInBThreshold":0.0,"differencesSourceThresholdUnit":"number","differencesSourceThreshold":0.0,"differencesTargetThresholdUnit":"number","differencesTargetThreshold":0.0,"passIfEmpty":"N","hideDatasets":"N","componentId":9,"componentName":"Multiple Data Compare 9","tableName":"","category":"Data Reconciliation","componentType":"Multiple Data Compare","rank":0,"displayRows":50,"dependencies":[8,5,6,7,1],"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.MultiDataCompareComponent","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"}],"isDeleteWorkSchemaTable":"N"}
